about.title: OS Yamato - ver.0
about.conceptText: OS Yamato is a new kind of OS that embraces the idea: "If a record is not touched, it returns to the wind." It avoids hoarding data, and stays quiet and gentle.
about.feature.calendar: Calendar: Use templates to stay organized
about.feature.memo: Memos, Contacts, and Wind Messages: Keep only what you need, lightly
about.feature.photo: Photos: Organize them and let them return to the wind
terms.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
terms.body:
OS Yamato is guided by the philosophy that "records, if untouched, return to the wind."

Your data is temporarily stored on our servers, but if there is no access for a certain period (currently 365 days for memos, contacts, messages, photos, etc.), it will be automatically deleted.

While we strive to provide the best possible service, unexpected system failures or disruptions may result in data loss. We strongly recommend that users back up important information on their own.

Users are responsible for managing their own data. By using OS Yamato, you agree to these terms and our data policy.
